page.title: 05EDUCATION IN TICKHILL
page.content: There are two{playgroups}in Tickhill each with its own toddlers group.One meets at the Old Library,the other at the Methodist Hall.Children start toddler group at two years old for one or two afternoons per week.They move on to playgroup every morning at three years old.There are three{schools}in Tickhill.They are St.Mary's First School for 4-8 year olds,St.Mary's Middle School for 8-12 year olds and Estfeld First and Middle School for 4-12 year olds.St.Mary's is a Church of England school.It draws mainly from the west side of Tickhill,or from those with a religious preferance. Catholic children usually attend St.Josephs primary school in Rossington.At 12 years old the childen transfer to a 12-16 comprehensive school with a 16-18{sixth-form}at Edlington.
